name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Motivation On Steroids - Elon Musk Edition

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Curated Elon Motivation While You Browse The Internet!. The Plugin loads curated Elon Musk Motivation Quotes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Motivation On Steroids - Elon Musk Edition shows you curated list of motivational quotes when you're browsing the Internet. 

Quotes are updated every day.

Note: The Plugin does not hamper your existing browsing experience :)
